plot: A haunted morgue at Jim's hospital begins to scare the staff, Delia has a secret admirer, and Eli may be experiencing a little too much one-on-one with his mother.

A dare between high school street punks winds up energizing an otherwise inert ghost lurking in the hospital morgue. Thus begins a frightening series of corpse manipulations, repeated scenes in Melinda's home of a heart surgery ending in death, and an unshakable sense within empathetic Aiden of doing something wrong. Meanwhile, as Eli, stricken with laryngitis, endures his late mother's smothering helpfulness, Delia finds herself lavished by the attentions of a persistent secret admirer.—statmanjeff
